data.title: Citrix XenServer, XenApp and XenDesktop
data.meta_description: Citrix technology running on NVIDIA virtual GPUs accelerates virtual desktops and applications.
data.text:
Citrix and NVIDIA pioneered virtual graphics delivery solutions back in 2013, with Citrix Hypervisor being the first hypervisor ever to offer virtual GPU support. The companies have been working together ever since to bring the power of NVIDIA virtual GPUs (vGPUs) to Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops environment. Today, you can deliver a visually rich, high-end user experience accessible to everyone from designers to mobile professionals to knowledge workersâ€”even in the most challenging network conditions.

The Citrix Ready Bundle with NVIDIA virtual GPU and Nutanix Enterprise Cloud bring industry-leading solutions together to help organizations cost-effectively deploy high-quality virtual desktops within minutes. Deliver graphics-accelerated virtual applications and desktops with the best possible user experience while simplifying infrastructure requirements and reducing administrative overhead.

Learn more about Citrix Ready Bundle Solutions >
